RainbruRPG::Network::FlooderTestBase

RainbruRPG::Network::FlooderTestBase Class Reference

#include <floodertestbase.h>

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

The base class of all netflooder's tests.

This class is used to make a list of test and to make easier the creation of new flood test.

Needs

These are the goals of this class :
  • The tests should be correctly integrate to the FOX GUI. So it must deal with ProgressBar.
  • Each test must deal with the EnetClient used to flood a server.
  • Each test can be part of a ChartBase. The statistics taken from a flooder should be a single value list. So if the user chose to launch several tests, they can be drawn in a single chart.
